title: 给世界的一封道歉信
contents:
前几天，看到有葱友写的一封道歉信，来了灵感，给大家看一下我的版本，
 写了 中英文的，靠google翻译，改动了一下，希望葱友可以帮忙指出错误，谢谢大家！


给世界的一封道歉信

对不起，世界！

我没有行使好作为一个中国公民的权利，监督这个政府。

对不起，世界！

因为中国政府隐瞒疫情，导致病毒扩散到全世界。

对不起，世界！

我们并不是想要满世界乱窜，只是我们自己都不知道自己生病了。

对不起，世界！

我们到现在还没查到病毒的起源，我甚至不知道我们伟大的主席去哪了。

对不起，武汉！

我不敢捐钱，因为我找不到一个值得信任的慈善机构，我怕钱到不了你们手中。

对不起，武汉！

我不敢回国，即使我很想撕碎那些拦着救援物资的红十字会。

对不起，武汉的公民记者！

在官媒失声时，你们勇敢的向世界发声，报道当地的情况，我却不能不敢保证你们的安全。

对不起，所有一线救护人员！

把你们推到了最前线，我们却只躲在背后加油。

对不起，中国公民！

即使我们说着相同的语言，都无法叫醒你，让你认清这个政权的邪恶。

对不起，世界！

我们病了，我们忘记如何说真话了。


一个中国公民



An apology letter to the world


Dear world, I’m truly sorry

I have not exercised my right as a Chinese citizen to oversee this government.

Dear world, I’m truly sorry

Because the Chinese government concealed the epidemic，lack of the alarm and preventive action, and then the virus spread to the world.

Dear world, I’m truly sorry

We don't want to roam around the world, we just don't know we are sick.

Dear world, I’m truly sorry

We have not yet traced the origin of the virus, and I don't even know where our great president has gone.

Dear Wuhan, I’m truly sorry

I dare not donate money, because I can't find a trustworthy charity. I'm afraid the money won't get into your hands.

Dear Wuhan, I’m truly sorry

I dare not return to my country, Even if I really want to tear up the Red Cross society, which is holding the rescue supplies.

Dear citizen journalist in Wuhan, I’m truly sorry

When the mainstream media remain silent on the virus, you bravely spoke to the world and reported on the local situation, but I can't even guarantee your safety.

Dear all frontline medics, I’m truly sorry

Pushing you to the forefront, we just hide behind you and cheer.

Dear Chinese citizen, I’m truly sorry

Even we speak the same language, I cannot wake you up and make you recognize the evil of this government.

Dear World , I’m truly sorry


We are sick, we forget how to tell the truth.


A Chinese citizen
